##### Privacy Policy

This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which n2yo.com collects, uses,
maintains and discloses information collected from users of the n2yo.com.com
Web Site (each, a "User").

##### Privacy

n2yo.com is committed to safeguarding the information Users entrust to
n2yo.com and believes every User should know how n2yo.com utilizes the
information collected from the Web Site.

##### The Information We Collect

n2yo.com may collect personally identifiable information from Users in a
variety of ways, including through online forms for setting customized
geographic locations, and other instances where Users are invited to volunteer
such information.

n2yo.com may also collect information about how Users use
our Web Site, for example, by tracking the number of unique views received by
the pages of the Web Site, or the domains from which Users originate.

We may
use "cookies" to track how Users use our Web Site.

A cookie is a piece of
software that a Web server can store on the Users' PC and use to identify the
User should they visit the web site again.

While not all of the information
that we collect from Users is personally identifiable, it may be associated
with personally identifiable information that Users provide us through our Web
Site.

The
cookies received with banner ads served by these networks are used to collect
and build anonymous behavioral profiles by these companies to deliver targeted
ads and tracking referrals, and n2yo.com does not have access to this
information.
